# V-Plus Agritech

### Urban farming, farm servicing, farm tours

V-Plus Agritech builds commercial farms that are high-yield, circular, solar-powered & suitable for water-stressed environments. Our USPs are low-emission farms with strong unit economics, and making food production profitable and accessible.

##### Expertise in the following

Sustainable Supply Chain & Logistic
